cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.mix: Muddle the sugar cube and bitters in a glass. Add whiskey and stir to combine add ice. Express an orange twist orver glass and drop it in.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
ingredients: Cherry or Lemon Twist to Garnish
cocktails.mix: Stir al ingredients with ice in a glass until chilled. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.mix: Stir al ingredients with ice in a glass until chilled. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Classic Irish Coffee
cocktails.mix: Warm the glass, add brown sugar to the glass. Pour coffee and stir to combine with the brown sugar, then add whiskey and stir again. Float whipped cream on top by pouring it over the back of a spoon.

cocktails.name: Cold Brew Irish Coffee
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, Add cold brew, irish whiskey, and simple syrup. Stir to combine, then float the cream on top by pouring it over the back of a spoon.

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.mix: Shake gin, lemon juice, and syrup with ice. Strain into a tall glass with ice. Top with soda water and garnish with the lemon twist

cocktails.name: Negroi
cocktails.mix: Stir all ingredients over ice, strain into glass with ice. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n Stormy
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, then add ginger beer and lime juice. Then float rum on top by pouring it over the back of a spoon. Top it off with a lime wedge

cocktails.name: Banana Jack
cocktails.mix: Fill a shaker with ice, add Jack Daniel's, banana liquour, and lemon juice. Shake and strain into a glass over ice. Top with a splash of ginger beer.

cocktails.name: Pimms Cup
cocktails.mix: Pour the Pimms over ice in a glass, fill with lemon soda as desired. Then top with all of the garnishes.

cocktails.name: Gin & It
cocktails.mix: Stir over ice and strain into a chilled glass filled with ice.

cocktails.name: English Garden
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Shandy
cocktails.mix: Fill half a glass wtih the lager, and the other half with the sprite.

cocktails.name: Snakebite
cocktails.mix: Fill half a glass with the lager, and the other half with the cider.

cocktails.name: Hot Toddy
cocktails.mix: Build in a mug starting with the tea, stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Classic Margarita
cocktails.mix: Run a lime wedge around the rim of our glass and dip the rim in salt. In a Shaker combine the tequila, cointreau, lime juice, and sweetener. Add ice then shake hard until well chilled. Strain into a glass with ice and garnish it with the lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Classic Mojito
cocktails.mix: In a glass muddle mint leaves with lime juice and simple syrup. Add rum and fill the glass with ice. Top the drink with soda water, stir gently to combine.  While combining bring the mint leaves from the top from the bottom. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Classic Mai Tai
cocktails.mix: Shake all Ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a glass with crushed ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Gimlet
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass, garnish with a lime wheel or a twist.

cocktails.name: Boulevardier
cocktails.mix: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well chilled. Then strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: London Fog Iced Tea
cocktails.mix: Steep the earl grey in hot water for 5-7 minuets. Fill a tall glass with ice, remove the tea bag and let the tea cool. In a seperate glass mix the milk and syrup, then pour the cooled tea over the ice and top with the vanilla milk mix. Stir to combine.

cocktails.name: Butterfly Peaflower Lemonade Tea
cocktails.mix: Steep the tea for 5-7 minutes with hot water, remove the tea bag and add sweetener for taste. Let the tea chill, fill a glass with ice then pour the tea in. Afterwards add lemon juice if you've done it right it should turn purple.

cocktails.name: Banana Jack Sour
cocktails.mix: Combine whiskey, banana liquour, lemon juice, simple syrup, and the egg white in a shaker. Shake hard before adding ice and shaking again until chilled and frothy. Strain into a glass with ice, topping with ginger beer.

cocktails.name: Classic Pina Colada
cocktails.mix: Toss everything into a blender. Then blend until sweet and slushy before pouring into a glass

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass wtih ice, add all spirites, lemon juice and simple syrup. Stir or shake to combine then top with cola

cocktails.name: Dalgona Coffee
cocktails.mix: Combine the instant coffee, sugar, and hot water in a bowl. Whip until it becomes thick, glossy, and forms soft peaks. Pour milk into glass over ice. Dollop whipped coffee over the milk. Stir togther before drinking

cocktails.name: Britanico
cocktails.mix: Pull a double shot using a espresso machine. Boil water into mug before adding espresso.

cocktails.name: Sazerac
cocktails.mix: Chill a glass. Muddle sugar and bitters add rye into a different glass. Stir with ice until chilled. Add a splash of absinthe, swirl to coat, then dump. Strin rye mix into the chilled glass then express the lemon peel and drop it in.

cocktails.name: Clover Club
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients without ice to froth the egg white. Add ice, then shake until the glass is well chilled and foamy. Strain into a glass with ice.

cocktails.name: Basil Gin Fizz
cocktails.mix: Muddle basil with lemon juice and syrup in a shaker. Add gin and egg white, dry shake. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a glass and top with soda water.

cocktails.name: Pink Lady
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients without ice to froth. Add ice shake again till chilled and foamy. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Flip
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients without ice till frothed. Add ice shake again. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Eggnog
cocktails.mix: Combine all ingredients without ice, shake thourouly to emulsify. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a small mug. Garnish with nutmeg and cinnamon.

cocktails.name: Ramos Gin Fizz
cocktails.mix: Shake everything but soda with no ice, add ice and shake again for 1-2 minutes. Strain into a chilled glass slowly top with soda water.

cocktails.name: Golden Fizz
cocktails.mix: Shake gin, lemon, syrup, and yolk without ice. Add ice and shake again until chilled and creamy. Strain then top with soda water

cocktails.name: Silver Fizz
cocktails.mix: Dry Shake all ingredients except soda without ice. Add ice then shake again until chilled and foamy. Strain into a chilled glass and top with soda.

cocktails.name: Royal Fizz
cocktails.mix: Dry Shake all ingredients except soda without ice. Add ice then shake again until chilled and foamy. Strain into a chilled glass then top with soda.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Silver Fizz
cocktails.mix: Dry Shake all ingredients except soda without ice. Add ice then shake again until chilled and foamy. Strain into a chilled glass and top with soda.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Golden Fizz
cocktails.mix: Dry Shake all ingredients except soda without ice. Add ice then shake again until chilled and foamy. Strain into a chilled glass and top with soda.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Royal Fizz
cocktails.mix: Dry Shake all ingredients except soda without ice. Add ice then shake again until chilled and foamy. Strain into a chilled glass and top with soda.

cocktails.name: Frozen Irish Flip
cocktails.mix: Blend everything until smooth and frothy, pour into a chilled glass. Garnish with shaved chocolate, nutmeg or dollop of whipped cream.

cocktails.name: White Russian
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add vodka and coffee liquour. Float cream on top using the back of a spoon.

cocktails.name: Hemingway Daiquri
cocktails.mix: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well chilled, then strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Vesper Martini
cocktails.mix: Stir or shake all ingredients with ice untill ice-cold. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Paper Plane
cocktails.mix: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously until well chilled, before straining into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Old Cuban
cocktails.mix: Gently muddle mint, lime juice, and syrup in a shaker. Add rum and bitters before shaking hard until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass then top with champagne.

cocktails.name: Cuba Libre
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add rum and lime juice before topping with coca-cola.

cocktails.name: Brandy Alexander
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Mudslide
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass with ice.

cocktails.name: Jack And Coke
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, pour in jack and lime juice before topping coke.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Ginger
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, pour in jack and lime juice before topping ginger ale.

cocktails.name: Lynchburg Lemonade
cocktails.mix: Shake everything but soda with ice. Strain into a chilled glass slowly top with soda.

cocktails.name: The Troublemaker
cocktails.mix: Build in a glass over ice, stir to chill and combine.

cocktails.name: Jack Apple Spritz
cocktails.mix: Build in a glass over ice, stir to chill and combine.

cocktails.name: Frozen Jack And Cherry Coke Slushy
cocktails.mix: Blend everything until smooth and frothy, pour into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Nojito
cocktails.mix: Muddle mint, lime and syrup in a glass. Add ice and top with soda, stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Peach Ginger Fizz
cocktails.mix: Shake peach nectar and lemon juice with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Top with ginger beer.

cocktails.name: Cucumber Berry Cooler
cocktails.mix: Muddle strawberries, cucumber, syrup and lime juice in a shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a glass with ice top with soda water.

cocktails.name: Citrus Smash
cocktails.mix: Shake citrus juices and syrup with ice. Double Strain into a glass with ice, before topping with soda.

cocktails.name: Fake and Coke
cocktails.mix: fill a glass with ice, pour in the spiritless and top with cola.

cocktails.name: The Pretender
ingredients: 3oz Cold Brew Lap Song Souchong Tea
cocktails.mix: Shake tea and citrus juices with ice. Strain into a chilled glass with ice, top with coke.

cocktails.name: Martinez
cocktails.mix: Stir all ingredients with ice, Strain inot a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: El Presidente
cocktails.mix: Stir with ice till chilled, strain into chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Bijou
cocktails.mix: Stir all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Hanky Panky
cocktails.mix: Stir all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Hot Buttered Rum
cocktails.mix: In a mug, combine butter, brown sugar, and simple syrup. Pour hot water over and stir to combine. Add rum and stir again. Garnish with nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass, garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Blue Blazer
cocktails.mix: In a heatproof mug, dissolve the sugar in boiling water. In a separate metal cup, heat the scotch until hot but not boiling. Carefully pour the scotch from one cup to the other, creating a stream of liquid that ignites. Pour the flaming liquid back and forth between the two cups several times to mix and cool slightly. Extinguish the flame by covering the cup or blowing it out. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Last Word
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.mix: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass and top with champagne.

cocktails.name: Rusty Nail
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add scotch and drambuie. Stir to combine.

cocktails.name: Rootbeer Rumchata Float
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add rumchata and top with rootbeer. Stir gently to combine, then add a scoop of vanilla ice cream on top.

cocktails.name: Aperol Spritz
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add aperol and prosecco. Top with soda water and stir gently to combine. Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add tequila and orange juice. Slowly pour grenadine over the back of a spoon to create a sunrise effect. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

cocktails.name: Screwdriver
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add vodka and orange juice. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Irish Trash Can
cocktails.mix: Fill a large glass with ice, add all the spirits. Top with red bull and stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Adios Mother Fucker
cocktails.mix: Build in a glass over ice, topping with ice at the end stir to chill and combine.

cocktails.name: Dirty Shirley
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add vodka and soda. Pour grenadine over the back of a spoon to create a layered effect. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Tunisian Death Drink
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with mint.

cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver #2
cocktails.mix: Rince a chilled glass with absinthe. Shake all other ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into the prepared glass.

cocktails.name: Smoked Maple Stone
cocktails.mix: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice, shake hard for about 10-12 seconds. Strain into a chilled glass garnishing with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Vieux Carre
cocktails.mix: Stir all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Brooklyn
cocktails.mix: Stir all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Scofflaw
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Iced Caramel Duchess Latte
cocktails.mix: Steep the Duchess Grey for 5min to make it strong. Remove bag then chill the tea. In a glass, Mix caramel syrup to dessolve the syrup. Fill a glass with ice then pour in the cold milk.

cocktails.name: Painkiller
cocktails.mix: Fill a shaker with ice, add all ingredients except nutmeg. Shake until well chilled, then strain into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Jungle Bird
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a glass filled with ice.

cocktails.name: Americano
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add campari and vermouth. Top with soda water and stir gently to combine. Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: White Wine Spritzer
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add white wine. Top with soda water and stir gently to combine. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Hugo Spritz
cocktails.mix: Muddle mint leaves and lime wedge in a glass. Fill the glass with ice, add elderflower syrup and prosecco. Top with soda water and stir gently to combine. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

cocktails.name: Penicillin
cocktails.mix: Shake blended scotch, lemon juice, and honey-ginger syrup with ice until well chilled. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Float the Islay scotch on top by pouring it over the back of a spoon.

cocktails.name: Grandmoms Pink Toinic
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add pink gin. Top with tonic water and stir gently to combine. Garnish with grapefruit squeezed slices.

cocktails.name: Blue Lagoon Mule
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add vodka, blue curacao, lime juice, and almond syrup. Top with ginger beer and stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Aviation
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Midori Sour
cocktails.mix: Shake midori, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice until well chilled. Strain into a glass filled with ice and top with soda water.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: White Lady
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients without ice to froth the egg white. Add ice and shake again until well chilled and foamy. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Bee's Knees
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass, rimmed with sugar.

cocktails.name: Brandy Smash
cocktails.mix: Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup and lemon juice in a shaker. Add brandy and ice, then shake until well chilled. Strain into a glass filled with ice.

cocktails.name: Stinger
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add brandy and creme de menthe. Stir to combine.

cocktails.name: Banana Colada
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

cocktails.name: Whisoda
cocktails.mix: Fill a glass with ice, add whiskey. Top with ginger ale and lemon-lime soda, stir gently to combine. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Elder Sage Elixer
cocktails.mix: Muddle the sage leaves with the lemon juice and honey syrup in a shaker. Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Moonlight Draught
ingredients: 0.25oz Creme de Violette or Lavender Syrup
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: The Pyromancer
ingredients: Dash of Chilli or Ginger Bitters
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Aether's Breath
cocktails.mix: Shake all ingredients with ice until well chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.
